result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.  
State moves to dismiss and read in this charge, the defendant entered a plea in Case File 15 CF 592.    Motion granted.   
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.
Plea Date set for 06-15-2016 at 2:30 p.m., Br. 1.

Attorney LaBre advises the Court the defendant has rejected the offer.
New charges have since been filed (in 16CF341).
Status conference set for 06-06-16 at 11:30 a.m.
Minutes.

Settlement Conference Summary.
Scheduling Conference is set for 02-18-2016 at 9:30 a.m., Br. 1.
Settlement Conference with D.A. set for 01-28-2016 at 4:00 p.m.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty plea entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is set for 12-10-15 at 3:30 p.m.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.

Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
Cover letter.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 11-10-15 at 1:30 p.m.   Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that defendant must report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours and defendant is to have no contact with any known drug users or dealers.   Bail furnished.  
Minutes.

Re:  Possess Heroin, 2nd and subsequent offense, on 10-06-15.  
Initial appearance is set for 11-02-15 at 2:30 p.m.
